class.name: LargeTexture
class.brief_description: A [Texture] capable of storing many smaller textures with offsets.
class.description: A [Texture] capable of storing many smaller textures with offsets. You can dynamically add pieces ([Texture]s) to this [LargeTexture] using different offsets.

method.name: add_piece
method.description: Adds [code]texture[/code] to this [LargeTexture], starting on offset [code]ofs[/code].

method.name: get_piece_count
method.description: Returns the number of pieces currently in this [LargeTexture].

method.name: get_piece_offset
method.description: Returns the offset of the piece with the index [code]idx[/code].

method.name: get_piece_texture
method.description: Returns the [Texture] of the piece with the index [code]idx[/code].

method.name: set_piece_offset
method.description: Sets the offset of the piece with the index [code]idx[/code] to [code]ofs[/code].

method.name: set_piece_texture
method.description: Sets the [Texture] of the piece with index [code]idx[/code] to [code]texture[/code].
